com.facebook.buck.java

Class JavacOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.java.JavacOptions

  • public class JavacOptions
extends Object
    Represents the command line options that should be passed to javac. Note that the options do not include either the classpath or the directory for storing class files.
